title: UOR Schemas Index
description: Definitive map of discrete manifolds within the UOR moduli stack implementing the pan-coherentism framework

metaManifold.description: The abstract foundational manifold from which all other manifolds derive

schemas.title: UOR Core Meta-Manifold
schemas.description: Defines the abstract manifold structure containing all possible factorizations
schemas.boundary: Self-contained; contains all possible representational systems

axiomManifolds.description: The eight discrete axiom manifolds defining the structure of factorization space

manifolds.title: Intrinsic Primes Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of irreducible elements in representational space
manifolds.function: Defines the atomic elements that cannot be factored further
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the distinction between reducible and irreducible elements

manifolds.title: Unique Factorization Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of unique decompositions in factorization space
manifolds.function: Ensures every object has exactly one prime factorization
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the properties of well-defined composition operations
manifolds.dimension: factorization-dimensional (one dimension per prime factor type)

manifolds.title: Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of structure-preserving maps between representations
manifolds.function: Preserves operations between original and prime representation spaces
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the types of operations that can be preserved

manifolds.title: Canonical Representation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of standard forms for each representable object
manifolds.function: Establishes a unique standard form for each object
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the requirement of observer-invariance

manifolds.title: Coherence Norm Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of measures quantifying representational integrity
manifolds.function: Defines metrics for measuring representational quality
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the properties of valid norm functions

manifolds.title: Inner Product Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of relationship measures between representations
manifolds.function: Defines how to measure relationships between representations
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the properties of valid inner product functions
manifolds.dimension: relationship-dimensional (one dimension per type of relationship)

manifolds.title: Trilateral Coherence Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of consistency relationships in the object-representation-observer triad
manifolds.function: Ensures consistency among object, representation, and observer
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the three aspects of the representation system

manifolds.title: Universal Mapping Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold establishing uniqueness of the prime coordinate framework
manifolds.function: Establishes that all valid representation systems factor through the prime system
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the space of all possible representation systems
manifolds.dimension: system-dimensional (one dimension per representation system type)

componentManifolds.description: The discrete component manifolds implementing the representation system

manifolds.title: Prime Coordinate Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of prime-based coordinate systems
manifolds.function: Implements the coordinate system using prime factorization
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the space of prime elements in each domain
manifolds.dimension: prime-dimensional (one dimension per prime element type)

manifolds.title: Observer Frame Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of observer reference frames
manifolds.function: Implements the perspective component of the representation system
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the valid types of observation perspectives

manifolds.title: Coherence Measure Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of coherence measurement systems
manifolds.function: Implements metrics for measuring representational coherence
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the mathematical properties of valid measures

manifolds.title: Canonical Representation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of standard representation forms
manifolds.function: Implements the standard representation forms for objects
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the representable properties of objects

numberTheoryManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds within the number theory domain

manifolds.title: Number Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of the number theory domain itself
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of natural numbers and its properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the natural numbers as a mathematical system

manifolds.title: Natural Number Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of natural number elements
manifolds.function: Defines the natural numbers with their prime factorization
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the countable infinity of natural numbers

manifolds.title: Prime Number Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of prime number elements
manifolds.function: Defines the irreducible elements in the number domain
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the countable infinity of prime numbers

manifolds.title: Factorization Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of factorization operations
manifolds.function: Defines the operation of decomposing numbers into primes
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the types of factorization algorithms

arithmeticOperationManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds of arithmetic operations

manifolds.title: Arithmetic Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of arithmetic operation patterns
manifolds.function: Defines the common structure of all arithmetic operations
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the complete set of arithmetic operation types

manifolds.title: Multiplication Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of multiplication operations
manifolds.function: Defines multiplication through prime exponent addition
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the multiplicative structure of natural numbers

manifolds.title: Addition Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of addition operations
manifolds.function: Defines addition through logarithmic-exponential bridge
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the additive structure of natural numbers

manifolds.title: Exponentiation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of exponentiation operations
manifolds.function: Defines exponentiation through prime exponent multiplication
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the exponential structure of natural numbers

manifolds.title: GCD Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of greatest common divisor operations
manifolds.function: Defines GCD through minimum prime exponent selection
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the divisibility structure of natural numbers

algebraManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds within the algebra domain

manifolds.title: Group Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of group structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of groups and their properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the group axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Ring Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of ring structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of rings with their addition and multiplication operations
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the ring axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Field Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of field structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of fields with division operations
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the field axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Vector Space Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of vector space structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of vector spaces with their linear structure
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the vector space axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Module Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of module structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of modules as generalized vector spaces
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the module axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Algebra Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of algebra structures
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of algebras combining vector space and ring properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the algebra axioms and their implications

manifolds.title: Polynomial Ring Domain Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of the polynomial ring domain itself
manifolds.function: Defines the domain of polynomials and its properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the polynomial ring as a mathematical system

manifolds.title: Polynomial Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial elements
manifolds.function: Defines polynomials with their irreducible factorization
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the countable infinity of polynomials

manifolds.title: Irreducible Polynomial Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of irreducible polynomial elements
manifolds.function: Defines the irreducible elements in the polynomial domain
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the irreducible polynomials in the coefficient field

manifolds.title: Polynomial Factorization Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial factorization operations
manifolds.function: Defines the operation of decomposing polynomials into irreducibles
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the types of polynomial factorization algorithms

algebraicElementsManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds of elements within algebraic structures

manifolds.title: Group Element Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of elements within group structures
manifolds.function: Defines the properties and behavior of group elements
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the group operation and axioms

manifolds.title: Ring Element Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of elements within ring structures
manifolds.function: Defines the properties and behavior of ring elements
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the ring operations and axioms

manifolds.title: Field Element Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of elements within field structures
manifolds.function: Defines the properties and behavior of field elements
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the field operations and axioms

manifolds.title: Vector Element Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of elements within vector spaces
manifolds.function: Defines the properties and behavior of vectors
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the vector space operations

manifolds.title: Module Element Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of elements within module structures
manifolds.function: Defines the properties and behavior of module elements
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the module operations and axioms

algebraicOperationManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds of operations within algebraic structures

manifolds.title: Group Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of operations in group structures
manifolds.function: Defines the group operation and its properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the group axioms

manifolds.title: Ring Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of operations in ring structures
manifolds.function: Defines the ring operations and their properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the ring axioms

manifolds.title: Field Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of operations in field structures
manifolds.function: Defines the field operations and their properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the field axioms

manifolds.title: Vector Operation Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of operations in vector spaces
manifolds.function: Defines the vector operations and their properties
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the vector space axioms

algebraicMorphismManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds of structure-preserving maps in algebra

manifolds.title: Algebraic Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of structure-preserving maps
manifolds.function: Defines homomorphisms between algebraic structures
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the domain and codomain structures

manifolds.title: Algebraic Isomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of structure-preserving bijections
manifolds.function: Defines bijective homomorphisms between algebraic structures
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the isomorphic structures

manifolds.title: Algebraic Automorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of structure-preserving self-maps
manifolds.function: Defines isomorphisms from a structure to itself
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the structure's symmetry properties

manifolds.title: Group Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of group homomorphisms
manifolds.function: Defines operation-preserving maps between groups
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the source and target group structures

manifolds.title: Ring Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of ring homomorphisms
manifolds.function: Defines operation-preserving maps between rings
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the source and target ring structures

manifolds.title: Field Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of field homomorphisms
manifolds.function: Defines operation-preserving maps between fields
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the source and target field structures

manifolds.title: Module Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of module homomorphisms
manifolds.function: Defines structure-preserving maps between modules
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the source and target module structures

manifolds.title: Vector Linear Map Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of linear transformations
manifolds.function: Defines linear maps between vector spaces
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the source and target vector spaces

polynomialOperationManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds of polynomial operations

manifolds.title: Polynomial Multiplication Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial multiplication operations
manifolds.function: Defines multiplication through irreducible factor exponent addition
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the multiplicative structure of polynomial rings

manifolds.title: Polynomial Addition Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial addition operations
manifolds.function: Defines addition through coefficient-wise operation with refactorization
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the additive structure of polynomial rings

manifolds.title: Polynomial Division Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial division operations
manifolds.function: Defines division through irreducible factor exponent subtraction
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the division structure of polynomial rings

manifolds.title: Polynomial GCD Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of polynomial GCD operations
manifolds.function: Defines GCD through minimum irreducible factor exponent selection
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the divisibility structure of polynomial rings

integrationManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds that integrate multiple domains

manifolds.title: Domain Bridge Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of inter-domain connections
manifolds.function: Enables transformation between different domain manifolds
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the compatible domains within the UOR framework

manifolds.title: Moduli Stack Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold organizing all domain manifolds
manifolds.function: Provides the structure for relating all domain manifolds
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the complete set of UOR-compatible domains

domainTransformationManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds implementing transitions between domains

manifolds.title: Domain Homomorphism Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of structure-preserving maps between domains
manifolds.function: Defines how structures map between different domain manifolds
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the preservable structures across domains

manifolds.title: Logarithmic Bridge Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of logarithmic-exponential transformations
manifolds.function: Defines transformations between additive and multiplicative structures
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by additive and multiplicative structural relationships

metaSchemaManifolds.description: The discrete manifolds defining the schema structure itself

manifolds.title: Schema.org Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of semantic vocabulary structures
manifolds.function: Provides semantic vocabulary for describing manifolds
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the semantic expressibility of vocabulary terms

manifolds.title: JSON Schema Meta-Manifold
manifolds.description: The discrete manifold of schema validation structures
manifolds.function: Provides validation framework for manifold descriptions
manifolds.boundary: Bounded by the expressibility of JSON Schema language

manifestationPath.description: Ordered manifestation sequence of the discrete manifolds

stages.function: Establish the axiomatic structure of manifolds
Implement the system components as manifolds
Implement the number theory domain manifolds

principles.name: Homomorphism Structure
principles.description: Relations defining how operations map between manifolds

principles.name: Observer Structure
principles.description: Relations defining how observation integrates with manifolds

principles.name: Coherence Structure
principles.description: Relations defining how coherence measures apply to manifolds

principles.name: Meta-Structure
principles.description: Relations defining how manifolds organize into the moduli stack
